version_description:
- Added 2 new Guardian Gods, “Nanda Empire” and “Northern Wei”. (Can choose in Ex-pack)
- Transferring game data to another mobile terminal is now enabled.
- Fastened the text speed in battles

- Fixed the problem of the game screen not properly shown on notched screen phones, iPhoneX and above.
- Bug Fixes

- Bug Fixes
- Deprecated saving data to the server
